abstract: William Howell and Damon Hickman, former deputies at Kentucky River Regional Jail in Hazard, face federal civil rights and manslaughter charges for using excessive force and failing to provide medical care, resulting in death of inmate Larry Trent in 2013.
lead_paragraph: Two former deputies at the Kentucky River Regional Jail in Hazard have been indicted on federal civil rights charges in the death of an inmate in 2013, prosecutors said Monday.

headline.main: Kentucky: Inmate’s Death Brings Civil Rights Charges
headline.print_headline: Kentucky: Inmate’s Death Brings Civil Rights Charges

snippet: Two former deputies at the Kentucky River Regional Jail in Hazard have been indicted on federal civil rights charges in the death of an inmate in 2013, prosecutors said Monday.
